item.title: Archive.today
item.description:
Archive.today is a simple tool for accessing snapshots of web pages — useful when a site is behind a paywall, taken down, or modified.

Paste any URL into https://archive.today to view an archived version of the page.

Benefits:

  • Bypasses many paywalls and subscription overlays
  • Preserves content that may later be deleted or edited
  • Useful for citation, research, and saving references

No login needed. No extensions. Just a direct snapshot of the web as it was.

EDIT: Most EU websites can be saved, but often you can’t get past the paywall
